Articles.Content:
It seems that the game is stuttering every 5-10 seconds no matter what kind of craft I have loaded. I think it has something to do with garbage collection, as the allocated memory drops by a few MB every time the stutter occurs.

KSP version 1.0.4

OS: Elementary os freya 0.3.1 (based on ubuntu 14.04)

Graphics: GTX 760

CPU: IntelÃ‚Â® CoreÃ¢â€žÂ¢ i7-2600 CPU @ 3.40GHz Ãƒâ€” 8

--edit-- Potential solution!

I believe I have found the culprit: Atmospheric Sound Enhancement. It must be incompatible with some of my mods. I'm so glad I have CKAN, it makes testing to see what breaks things so much easier.
Edited September 19, 2015 by peachoftree

Probably Smokescreen, I had it do it as part of the Realism Overhaul pack. Opening Smokescreen's config I could see the particle count periodically drop and that was exactly in sync with the severe stutter.

I suggest removal of SmokeScreen and see if your issue is fixed

EDIT : woops, cantab beat me

It's a known issue but there's not always a good fix :-( This happened to me for awhile too, even with no mods. I updated the NVidia driver (i use Ubuntu) recently and the problem as somewhat cleared up.
I believe I have found the culprit: Atmospheric Sound Enhancement. It must be incompatible with some of my mods. I'm so glad I have CKAN, it makes testing to see what breaks things so much easier.
